# encode(commandBuffer:)

**Instance Method**

Encode this spatial scaler work into a command buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
func encode(commandBuffer: any MTL4CommandBuffer)
```

## Parameters

- **commandBuffer**: A command buffer into which this spatial scaler encodes work.
